name: date

func:
msg={topic:"UPDATE run_commands SET command = '"+msg.payload+"',frm='node-red',exec=0 WHERE id=1;"}

topic: SELECT * FROM `commands_executed` WHERE id=(SELECT max(id) FROM commands_executed)
